程序包 nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp21.persistency.reader

接口 FileReader

所有已知实现类:
LeafReader, XMLFileReader
public interface FileReader
"Component" . An FileReader interface to achieve the following abstraction. 1. load the board from the original game levels. 2. load the board from saved game map. 3. load the saved action records file. 4. get the starting coordinates of all bugs.
作者:
Rae 300535154

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    java.util.List<Coordinate> getEnemyStartPos()
    get the starting coordinates of all Enemy.
    Board loadOriginMap​(java.lang.String fileName)
    load the board from the original game levels, which contains all essential information of each tile.
    java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> loadSavedActions​(java.lang.String fName)
    load the saved action records file.
    Board loadSavedMap​(java.lang.String fName)
    load the board from saved game state, with updated tile status.

  • 方法详细资料

    • loadOriginMap

      Board loadOriginMap​(java.lang.String fileName)
      load the board from the original game levels, which contains all essential information of each tile. Tile type and Tile coordinate and (info message or key/door color)
      参数:
      fileName - game levels
      返回:
      the completed board

    • loadSavedMap

      Board loadSavedMap​(java.lang.String fName)
      load the board from saved game state, with updated tile status.
      参数:
      fName - saved game files
      返回:
      the saved board

    • loadSavedActions

      java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> loadSavedActions​(java.lang.String fName)
      load the saved action records file. With timer, actor, and direction.
      参数:
      fName - saved file name
      返回:
      a list of actions and records map

    • getEnemyStartPos

      java.util.List<Coordinate> getEnemyStartPos()
      get the starting coordinates of all Enemy.
      返回:
      a list of coordinates
